name: BULLETLINE
description: Welcome to a world where ninjas, spec-ops agents, chefs, cowboys, princesses, and the wretched hag do battle with automatic assault weapons and high-powered rifles - BULLETLINE is the ultimate combat-focused, team-based, local-multiplayer game-mode-royale.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
